title: Mobile-Based Blended Learning and Adaptive e-Learning Module Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate expertise in social domains
context.additional_context: Need to establish a smartphone-based accessible educational environment for current practitioners, with demand for platform-independent content usable without geographical constraints

learning_goals: Learners can engage in self-directed learning with adaptive e-learning modules at over 80% accuracy in mobile environments
Learners can revise and supplement learning content by over 90% within two weeks based on real-time feedback from automated assessment systems
Learners submit final outputs within four weeks by combining peer and automated evaluations while performing social issue analysis tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
